newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech CNB-120 index falls 2.8 points to 802 pts.
newsitem.headline: Czech CNB-120 index falls 2.8 points to 802 pts.

text.p: The CNB-120 index, a broad daily measure of Czech equities, fell 2.8 points on Tuesday to 802.0, the Czech National Bank (CNB) said.
Five of the ten sectoral indices lost, with the investment fund index losing the most, down 34.8 points, or 2.71 percent, to 1,247 points.
Five indices rose, with the energy index rising the most, up 7.1 points, 0.75 percent, to 950.9.
